website_summaries.verdict: A soft bolster suitable for massage or supporting your back while you sleep.
pros: Long enough for all types of users
Made from CertiPUR-US certified foam, which does not contain chemicals
Suitable for laying on your side or on your back
cons: Some find this bolster to be too soft

customer_reviews.title: The REAL Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Seller's listing was quite confusing, listing three different dimensions for the pillow. Actual measurements are 25" long, 6" high, and 11.5" wide at the base. Pillow works well for my use, underneath my knees to reduce stress on my lower back when lying in bed. Unlike another product I used, this pillow is quite firm and hasn't permanently deformed from being slept on all night. At 25" wide, pillow is wide enough to allow me to sprawl a bit without my legs falling off of it. Width is great enough that pillow requires a king-sized pillowcase to protect it and cover the somewhat tacky overprinting on its cover.
customer_reviews.author: Caffiend

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality But Compresses Too Much To Be Of Any Use
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this cushion is excellent. My gripe is that when using this under my knees while sleeping on my back (to protect my back) my knees sink almost all the way down into the memory foam. As a result it really isn't elevating my knees very much. Wish the exact same shape was available in a much firmer cushion. This might work better for a much lighter person, although my 120 lb wife experienced the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions for this are supposed to be 26 long, 16 wide and 6 deep. It comes rolled un in a ball and when unrolled is 23 inches long, 11 inches wide and barely 3 inches deep aka useless piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Daak

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this pillow. I have a sedentary job and have been struggling with back aches. (And I'm only 27, so I'm too young for back problems.) I've tried a number of lumbar pillows, but this one is definitely a cut above the rest. Fits right in with the curve of my back, and I've enjoyed sleeping with it as well. The support is excellent, and it keeps its shape even though there have been days where I've used it almost around the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Nice for some uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put behind my back while side sleeping due to being pregnant. It's OK for that purpose but it's really hard to get it to stay in place without laying partially on top of it (vs leaning weight against it). I am trying to think of something I can attach/sew to it to keep it from sliding away when I lean my back against it. With that said, it's very nice for under the knees when on my back, or under my head pillow when I want to be a bit more upright for reading. It's also nice to snuggle and use between my knees when on my side. It's a semi-soft foam.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well made product
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and can say without reservation that it was worth every penny. After the initial adjustment to get it in the proper position, it did what it was intended to elevate my knee to reduce swelling and pain. Even though I have a TempurPedic adjustable bed, I wanted to raise my knee even higher. I awoke this morning to realize that unlike pillows or foam wedges, once I’d gotten it in position, I was completely unaware that it was even there.
customer_reviews.author: poison pen

customer_reviews.title: Great support for lower back pain related to leg position.
customer_reviews.text: I have seriously screwed up my sacroiliac joint and suffer from a LOT of pain when laying on my back in bed so I got the idea to look for this after a massage where they used a bolster under my knees. This one is a bit taller than most others but does compress just enough and really helps me. I’m not pain free all the time but at least I can lay flat and not want to cry.
customer_reviews.author: SeaWitchRavenclaw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied, pillow opened up pretty fast after taking ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger then I was expecting. Pretty satisfied, pillow opened up pretty fast after taking it out of the package with a slight weird smell but not too concerned. Going to let it air out and continue to fully expand for 24hrs. Will update once I’ve used it and had it for a while for a full review on product. But so far pretty happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Good size, comfortable, just gets a tiny bit warm.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both got this bolster for our knees - trying to prevent ourselves from sleeping on our sides as much since we've started having back and neck issues. It's a really great height, I thought it was going to be too large but it compresses down nicely to a comfortable height (I'm average size and weight). Only thing I wish is for it to feel a bit cooler - I run hot at night. I have a nice head pillow with cooling gel, kinda wish this had the same thing, I'll sometimes kick it off in the night because it's too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Minion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome back support...
customer_reviews.text: for a few years now, people have told me to use a pillow between my knees, or under my knees for my myriad of back issues. I tried but always woke with the pillow kicked off the bed, at the bottom of the bed...and my back aching. This bolster pillow is awesome, only once since i've gotten it did I find it at the bottom of the med (in 4 weeks). It's so comfortable it doesn't keep me awake and i forget its there. It's even very easy to move it from your knees, to behind your knees. I love this pillow and if something happens to it, i'll buy another! I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Bre Branco

customer_reviews.title: Helps With Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bolster to use while sleeping and during meditation class (because my back aches). I put it under my knees when I am lying on my back and between my knees when I am side-sleeping. It is the perfect size and soft enough that it is easy to move when I change positions during sleep. I like the fact that it has a removable washable cover. I like it so much I bought one as a gift for my friend. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M.

customer_reviews.title: Confusing title, double check size for your needs
customer_reviews.text: Really should have looked at the photo with the size a bit closer. The title had for back and neck relief so I really thought it would be smaller to fit under the neck. This thing is quite large. It is good for going under knees or ankles, but unless you like your head going forward 45 degrees, do not use as a cervical neck pillow. Good for a side sleeper, but I flop around too much to use it. Otherwise, it is a nice foam pillow for a good price. I really wanted a neck pillow but I can use this for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Belshan

customer_reviews.title: Love the size, However, it's way to plush....Sorry
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the pillow... but it's way to plush to sleep on. Even if I support it with a thin layer pillow underneath, still way too plush. It needs to be a little bit more firm. It's firmness is like a 2 [1 too plush, 10 too firm]... it should be a 5ish. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: AHA-1211

customer_reviews.title: Love this bolster
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my legs aching in the evening & I have 1 bad knee. I sit in a comfy chair & use an ottoman. I put the bolster under my knees & it raises it up just enough to relieve the pain in my knee & legs. It's memory foam & very soft. I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Soft and odor free
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing especially for the price! Comes squished in a small cylinder and pops out to full size within minutes. I am very sensitive to odors and this foam is almost sentless. Cover is very soft and zips off for washing. Purchased to put under knees while sleeping on back and recovering from knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Ethyl

customer_reviews.title: NOT a neck bolster, more like a knee bolster. This product is BIG.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the product I expected. I wanted a small bolster to use behind my neck but this is more akin to what you'd see used on a massage table behind the knees. Still, it's very comfortable and I've been able to incorporate it into my stash of pillows, so it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BnB

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been having back problems due to prolonged periods of sitting. My Dr said to start propping up my knees to take stress off my back at night. This is definitely doing the job! I feel better in the mornings and all day now! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Relief for Lower Back Pain!!
customer_reviews.text: My lower back gets serious pain and swelling after during construction of projects around my house. I prefer to just ice my back vs pills. This helps tremendously!! It takes the pressure of my lower back and allows me to lay and sleep in comfort. It is very soft so it doesn't hurt my knees after use. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CampGolfEat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect relief
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have brought myself in a long time. Have suffered with my back for a long time always pushing a pillow under my knees to give me support and take the pressure of my back. Well this is it try it you will not be disappointed 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but really BIG.
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice, but also huge! Too long for a standard pillowcase. Good quality, but I thought it would be quite a bit smaller, so it could be used as a lumbar support in a platform rocker. I guess I should have paid better attention to the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Frazier

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: not as firm as I would like and though it gives the height it is nor as high as I need
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Toker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice for keeping under/between knees while sleeping, to reduce low back and knee strain. I like the materials, the size and weight of this product. It can also be used to lean against while resting.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Helped with hip and knee pain
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No idea where I’m going to find a pillow case to fit this though. Much bigger than you think. I have a 32inch leg and this goes under the entire thing from hip to ankle. Final thoughts: Ignore any reviews stating weird smells or poor quality. It arrived vacuum sealed and was self inflated within 3-5 minutes. Smell was never an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emery

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my leg support while sleeping, I had ordered something before but it was too small. If it isn't big enough and my foot hangs down it effects my hip (yikes I'm old) and it's very soft but supportive, I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Rasonsky

customer_reviews.title: Ten toes up! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow, it's just round and squishy enough for me and I'm 5'3. It also makes a great side sleeper for those of us that have a bad hip and need a pillow between their knees at night. Kinda like getting a 2 Fer 1. Also great is the zip off cover you can wash. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow for my knees!
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I LOVE this pillow. I had it in my Amazon shopping cart several times and moved it to wish list several times. I wish I had not put off the purchase. It helps with my knee & hip pain so much. Finally being able to sleep thru the night. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knee pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and level of softness to put under my knees when I sleep. It helps a lot with low back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great for knee pain relief!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fits comfortably under my knees and relieves knee pain while using. The pain relief alone is the best sales pitch you could want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is AWESOME! What a deal for under $11
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is AWESOME! What a deal for under $11!! It’s soft, yet supportive, it’s close to the size of a regular pillow....making it nice for putting a pillowcase over. I highly recommend this pillow to anyone looking for a half moon style.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from lower back pain and purchased this pillow to put under legs and between legs while I am sleeping. Pillow works great and came with pillow case. It is too large for my use but memory foam is great.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just had cosmetic surgery and this pillow was a life saver for my back. So soft. Will be ordering a few more because now everyone in my house wants one. Great product and large size too.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice size
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice size, very comfortable. I wish it didn't squish down so much, it is memory foam I guess, and you do lose some height as it squishes.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - helps with my sciatica pain. I love sleeping with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Joy

customer_reviews.title: too big for a 5'3 lady
customer_reviews.text: A little too large for me. I am 5'3 and my legs dont quite bend and land where I would like them too over the contoured top. I think if you are a little taller than me, you would find more comfort in it.
customer_reviews.author: Genene Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. I love putting it under my knees, it takes the pressure off and helps me relax after standing all day at my job. I would buy again but I don't think I will have to for a long time as the build quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great size & Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love.. I can't believe I allowed myself to stay in pain. While there was other options to help with the relief. Many of which consisted of pain meds, surgery, physical therapy. I was constantly searching for a solution. A friend suggested a memory foam pillow.. Well as you know the "good" ones are very pricey. I was doubt full of finding one.. And then I found this.... OMG I am 100% in love.. I use my pillow every night. And the price.. I swear by my pillow.. I am even buying another one now.
customer_reviews.author: Beckii

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: Firm enough to make a difference in my back. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Hummer52

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for that purpose but it's actually useless. But it does help when you sleep side ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a neck or shoulder pain, this pillow won't help at all. I bought it for that purpose but it's actually useless. But it does help when you sleep side way to hold your leg onto it.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the shape and memory foam material of the bolster, which works both when I'm on my back and on my side. They are a little too long for a regular pillow case, but fit fine in an extra long one (king size?). It seems that they will not lose their shape, like the knee wedges I used to have, which got packed down fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: IE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this fairly small package arrives, I open it and set it on the dining room table. OMG! It expands! It is rather large and wonderful support for my leg with edema. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Maisycocoa

customer_reviews.title: the pillow itself is great, very soft and memory foam- ish
customer_reviews.text: I am having some trouble adjusting from sleeping on my side to my back , the pillow itself is great, very soft and memory foam- ish .. I am just having trouble with where to put it.
customer_reviews.author: Lbranm

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillow! Unfortunately I got it for my mom who is in need of a knee replacement and can't use it bc it sits up too high and makes her knees hurt worse.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for! Firm and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Firm and not too much give so I could elevate my legs. It may be a tad bigger than what I wanted but the quality of the product makes up for that. Took a few minutes to come back to size after I pulled it out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Much more comfortable if a bolster than your typical massage therapy bolsters. Clients love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great under knee/back support!
customer_reviews.text: This is more than I could have thought it could be! This is a quality memory foam half moon bolster that gives tremendous support for under the knees. What value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Smedley

customer_reviews.title: 👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use as a pillow because it’s too stiff and big for under the neck but it’s pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and light! Fits perfectly on a massage table. I have two of them :]
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your treatment room!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for my practice! It's soft yet supportive and the price is right! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Sussi B Saber

customer_reviews.title: Great Support Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs (knee support while sleeping). I wish I could find a pillow case that actually fits it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimerry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations! Comfortable, much better than other pillows I’ve used for knees and back.
customer_reviews.author: Mistfromthesea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great, extremely comfortable and for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Darius Phiffer

customer_reviews.title: I have issues with my back. This helps so much
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with my back. This helps so much. I will get one for my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to elevate ankle
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to sleep with to elevate my ankle. Perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: teacher k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this Half-Moon Bolster very much. Use it in my Reiki sessions. It is very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its okay but too big for me to use as neck pillow.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Like it but a little big for me
customer_reviews.text: Used it. Like it but a little big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Greenapples

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Using for my massage table. It's perfect for under the knee support. I like that it is a half circle, it's much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height and density
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Perfect height and density. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my husband says it helps him to stretch his spine and neck.
customer_reviews.author: marsha tandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great memory foam bolster. The cover is soft, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JFunk

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than expected. Assumed it was similar to those used by massage therapists.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I am really enjoying my pillow, I haven't washed ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my pillow, I haven't washed it yet! It arrived in a timely manner and the pillow keeps returning to it's original form, after use!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy pillow but it was much flatter than i expected. I expected it to be rather round and instead it’s about the width of a regular pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Boston

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: first night with these and I slept like a baby. Absolutely worth evety penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: nedum bakor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s perfect n very soft n so comfortable. Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Rxs163

customer_reviews.title: Soft, yet supportive
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pillow. It wasn't what I was looking for, but it is good quality and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: lalaisluv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support!
customer_reviews.text: We use the pillow at our wellness center to help people feel the most comfortable. Great quality!! Everyone loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow but the seller sent me a return item with the tag ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: eL-eL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was not thick enough under my knees to provide adequate support.
customer_reviews.author: rselby

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable bolster ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work but it was so comfortable I had to bring it home for personal use!
customer_reviews.author: Rorosemaryfrann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to help my back while I'm laying in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good. A little bulky when trying to move around in bed but serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow - I use it to elevate my lower legs. It helps fight puffy feet, and is so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: HJC

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam is nice though
customer_reviews.text: Way to high for a neck pillow. The memory foam is nice though
customer_reviews.author: O R

customer_reviews.title: It is too big to support my knees and back ...
customer_reviews.text: It is too big to support my knees and back, but I use it for supporting my back when sitting on my big sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It’s good quality pillow. Does the job and helps my back.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for reading in bed at night. Just the right amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Denton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for helping me to train myself to sleep on my back. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: An amazing deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so phenomenal. An amazing deal for the price! It is the perfect size and firmness, with a little give but doesn't flatten like some of those cheap memory foam pillows. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jordanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and it's worked well to release the pressure on my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Wide enough for both legs to be supported. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna B Willis

customer_reviews.title: Stinks like hades when it shows up too so be prepared ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes totally flat within seconds of laying on it. Totally defeats the purpose of a side-laying lumbar/abdomen support pillow. Stinks like hades when it shows up too so be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected... but nice
customer_reviews.text: The construction of this pillow is fantastic: plush, large and soft. I love the size, the shape but, the 6" body compresses down to about 3" when in use. This makes the support I was expecting less than adequate for my needs. Also, because it is a unique size, I'm going to have to sew a cover for the product. Wish it came with a cover.
customer_reviews.author: karen cearley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pillow, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow! I was surprised that it was so much cheaper than similar pillows made of the same material. Quality is excellent. It comes squashed up in a little carrying case, but within a few minutes the pillow had expanded and filled out into perfect shape (I was impressed!). The pillow works great to prop up my knees when sleeping (I'm a back sleeper) or to cuddle between my knees when resting on the couch watching TV. Very comfortable with lots of uses. I already don't know how I did without it. Best $10.99 I've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: It is soft but supportive to my painful back. Buy this pillow it has defiantly helped ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is absolutely fabulous !!! I have extreme lower back pain and have had several surgeries. This pillow was delivered fast. I took it out of it's packaging and it rose to size. The outside cover is very soft to the touch and washable. The first night I placed this pillow in the small of my back I could feel the difference. It supported my back very well. I had the most restful sleep I have had in along time. It is soft but supportive to my painful back. Buy this pillow it has defiantly helped me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Berny

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Size Measurements
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is advertised as 26x16x6” and pictures a measurement diagram with these measurements in the item photos. These measurements are fake. The pillow is not 16” wide. The tag on the actual pillow states a width of 12” instead of 16”. 12” is not enough support under the knees to alleviate back pain. Buy something else if you don’t like being taken advantage of.
customer_reviews.author: MacBook

customer_reviews.title: It's BIG and provides great support.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the case on the one I got was too big for the bolster. I prefer the quilting on Joey's Half-Moon pillow, but this bolster is to support clients' knees/low back and Joey's was too short. This bolster is long, supportive, and comfortable. Give it a solid day to expand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: It is sooo soft that there is no support at ...
customer_reviews.text: It is sooo soft that there is no support at all...I really question all the 5 star reviews. I was so surprised that it hardly provided any support to neck or back or under knee...very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Quality pillow
customer_reviews.text: Multi use for me. Under knees to relieve stress on back muscles. Or under neck to maintain neutral position of cervical vertebrae. Not over flexed or extended Generous size in length and circumference soft but keeps shape while supporting joints. Flat side keeps pillow from moving around once in place. Definitely recommend for comfortable positioning while sleeping. Nice washable cover. I will buy another for extended trips from home
customer_reviews.author: JSA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Update: 11 months later, I still love it but I wish they made a contour pillow in this exact pillow/stuffing! I’ve been searching for a comfy one like this for a LONG time I love this pillow! I use it for many things. I had a bulging disc and so i use it under my legs and it's comfortable. I also use it under my knees when I'm sitting up on my bed reading or knitting/crocheting. I also hug it like a body pillow (when i'm side sleeping) AND I use it to block my son from sleeping right up against me :)
customer_reviews.author: Phanessa

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever sleep without this pillow?
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged. This pillow is amazing. I was worried about how big it is since I'm very small, but it forms to my body perfectly. I've used it under my knees when lying on my back, between my knees for side sleeping, and I've even propped it behind my back! There is no wrong way to use this great pillow! Has a nice thick cover that comes with it for easy washing. The memory foam is great-always snaps back to its original shape and still provides excellent support. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: smidget

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Bolster Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly for under knees to relieve lower back pain and also works well between knees and ankles to reduce pressure/pulling in lower back. Its comfortable, easy to keep track of and position, and has a removable/washable cover. It arrives vacuum packed so give it a few minutes to air up.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Serda

customer_reviews.title: way too big to use under your knees.
customer_reviews.text: well made and good quality but it's HUGE! i thought it was going to be small to go under my knees when i sleep but it's way way too big. i tried and it wont work. i guess i could use it to sit up in bed while reading... but for the most part it's on the floor beside my bed and i don't see myself using it.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in freezing temps I was concerned about the shape and the pillow coming out of it. Left it at room temp for 20 min then decided to put it in the dryer for 20 min. Set it out and after an hour or so it was perfect. It's been great ever since. A king size pillow case fits over it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oversized but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow arrived in a very compact package but once you remove it, it starts to inflate. It took a couple of hours for it get to full size. It is a very well made pillow. The reason that I am not giving it 5 stars is that it is too big to be comfortable. I am a 5’9” woman with long legs and it is too large for me. I have to pull my knees way up to get my feet flat on the bed. I can’t imagine how it would work for anyone shorter than me.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Comfort; washable
customer_reviews.text: I love my pillow! I was looking for something reasonable that could prop my head up when I slept. Not positive this is doing that job, because it's very soft, but my neck feels better, even if I do still snore on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Beth (part of real name)

customer_reviews.title: Flattens
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the reviews. It squashes too flat, so it doesn’t elevate my knees enough to take pressure off my lower back. I’m sad that it isn’t working.
customer_reviews.author: JDWest

customer_reviews.title: Speed bump
customer_reviews.text: Listed as ultrasoft, I thought this would have some give and be comfortable under the knees. Unfortunately it feels more like a speed bump. Very hard, too thick and uncomfortable. I tried it under the neck and again it's too thick, too wide, too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Truth CrusaderTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Eased my back pain!
customer_reviews.text: A friend and my massage therapist recommended this pillow to help with some of my lower back pain. It has done wonders. Also helps remind me to sleep on my back when I stir at night.
customer_reviews.author: Ladibugz

customer_reviews.title: Soft, provides ample support
customer_reviews.text: I don't sleep on this pillow, but I do use it for other activities. It is definitely firm and shapes to your body, and is soft enough to allow you to relax against it. So far it bounces back to its original half-moon shape when unused, but I haven't been rough with it so I can't say how much use and abuse it can take.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C

product_meta.title: Zen Bamboo Memory Foam Half-Moon Bolster for Back and Knee Pain Relief - Wedge Pillow Provides Ultimate Support for Side and Back Sleepers - Semi Roll Pillow, Ultra-Soft, Washable Bamboo Blend Cover
product_meta.description:
The Half-Moon Bolster Support Pillow is made from high quality CertiPUR certified memory foam, and it's versatile design is capable of improving support and circulation in several different ways. Use the cushion under your back, under or between your knees, or under your ankles - it's the ultimate support solution for side and back sleepers. Our half-moon pillow also boasts a super-soft and smooth bamboo/microfiber blend cover that feels amazing against the skin. Not only does the pillow offer excellent support, it is also hypoallergenic. Half-moon style bolster pillows are recommended by doctors, athletic trainers, chiropractors, and physical therapists to promote comfortable, well-aligned sleep.

Don't wait! Order your Half-Moon Memory Foam Bolster Pillow today!
feature_bullets: Cover - 60% Brushed Microfiber, 40% Rayon Derived from Bamboo

ELEVATE YOUR LEGS - The Half-Moon Bolster Support Pillow offers several positions to promote support and comfortable rest. Use the cushion under your legs, under your back, between your knees, or under your ankles. This is the ideal cushion for side and/or back sleepers to improve muscle/joint alignment and circulation.

RELIEVE YOUR KNEES - Designed to relieve pain, our half-moon pillow is slightly larger than other similar products, making the cushion more versatile and ensuring all body shapes and sizes can benefit. Our support pillow measures approximately 26"x12"x6".

TRUSTED & RECOMMENDED - Half-moon style bolster pillows are recommended by doctors, physical therapists, chiropractors, massage therapists, and athletic trainers. Our support pillow is fashioned with CertiPUR-US certified foam that is made without ozone contaminants and other potentially harmful chemicals.

VERSATILE AND COMFORTABLE - Whatever your sleeping position, this pillow is for you! Our pillow is hypoallergenic! Additionally, it is completely allergen and chemical free. This is the perfect choice for those suffering from asthma, allergies, and other respiratory issues.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We are so confident in the quality of our product! If you are unsatisfied please contact us. We want to make sure you are 100% satisfied.
